explains: vt. 砍头；使河流被夺流

sentences.en: Take him out and behead him!
Their goal was to kill scores of people, with specific plans to behead 14 of them.
sentences.cn: 他们的目的是杀死数十人，并将其中14人斩首。

sentences.en: It is not uncommon to cut hands for stealing and behead someone for more heinous crimes.
sentences.cn: 这种情况并非罕见削减手中偷窃和斩首有人更令人发指的罪行。
